com.filestack

Class FileLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.filestack.FileLink

  • public class FileLink
extends java.lang.Object
    References and performs operations on an individual file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileLink(java.lang.String apiKey, java.lang.String handle)
      Constructs an instance without security.
      FileLink(java.lang.String apiKey, java.lang.String handle, Security security)
      Constructs an instance with security.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileLink

        public FileLink(java.lang.String apiKey,
                java.lang.String handle)
        Constructs an instance without security.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - account key from the dev portal
        handle - id for a file, first path segment in dev portal urls

      • FileLink

        public FileLink(java.lang.String apiKey,
                java.lang.String handle,
                Security security)
        Constructs an instance with security.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - account key from the dev portal
        handle - id for a file, first path segment in dev portal urls
        security - needs required permissions for your intended actions

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

        public byte[] getContent()
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Directly returns the content of a file.
        Returns:
        byte[] of file content
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for network failures, invalid handles, or invalid security

      • download

        public java.io.File download(java.lang.String directory)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the file to the specified directory using the name it was uploaded with.
        Parameters:
        directory - location to save the file in
        Returns:
        File object pointing to new file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for network failures, invalid handles, or invalid security

      • download

        public java.io.File download(java.lang.String directory,
                             java.lang.String filename)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the file to the specified directory overriding the name it was uploaded with.
        Parameters:
        directory - location to save the file in
        filename - local name for the file
        Returns:
        File object pointing to new file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for network failures, invalid handles, or invalid security

      • overwrite

        public void overwrite(java.lang.String pathname)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Replace the content of an existing file handle. Does not update the filename or MIME type.
        Parameters:
        pathname - path to the file, can be local or absolute
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for network failures, invalid handles, or invalid security
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the given pathname isn't a file or doesn't exist

      • delete

        public void delete()
            throws java.io.IOException
        Deletes a file handle. Requires security to be set.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - for network failures, invalid handles, or invalid security
